item.description:
Even if we don't always get the grammar right, we always have a great time. All levels of Italian are welcome.

Bring a friend!

Whether you're new to our group or have been a member since Day One, stop by for a coffee and/or cookie, and have a chat with your friends at the RI Italian Language Group!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Italian dictionaries and smiling faces!
item.why: Always a great time and good practice!

group.name: The Rhode Island Italian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Italian Conversation
